xmlText.hl2: ATP World Tour Ecuador Open Results
xmlText.p: Alessandro Giannessi, Italy def. Peter Polansky, Canada, 6-3, 6-4.
Gerald Melzer, Austria, def. Marco Cecchinato, Italy, l6-2, 6-2.
Ivo Karlovic (7), Croatia, def. Ernesto Escobedo, United States, 6-4, 6-7 (6), 7-6 (4).
Nicolas Jarry (8), Chile, def. Facundo Bagnis, Argentina, 6-7 (4), 6-2, 7-6 (5).
Roberto Quiroz, Ecuador, def. Yannick Hanfmann, Germany, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
Victor Estrella Burgos, Dominican Republic, and Casper Ruud, Norway def. Federico Gaio, Italy, and Andrej Martin, Slovakia, 6-1, 7-5.
Austin Krajicek and Jackson Withrow, United States, def. Roberto Carballes Baena, Spain, and Marco Cecchinato, Italy, 6-3, 6-4.
Alessandro Motti and Stefano Travaglia, Italy, def. Treat Huey, Philippines, and Philipp Oswald (2), Austria, 6-4, 6-4.
Santiago Gonzalez and Miguel Andel Reyes-Varela (3), Mexico, def. Alessandro Giannessi and Paolo Lorenzi, Italy, 6-3, 6-3.
Dorian Descloix and Gael Monfils, France, def. Marcelo Demoliner, Brazil, and Purav Raja (1), India, 6-7 (2), 6-4, 14-12.
Nicolas Jarry and Hans Podlipnik-Castillo, Chile, def. Facundo Bagnis, Argentina, and Joao Souza, Brazil, 6-0, 7-6 (2).
Sergio Galdos, Peru, and Gerald Melzer, Austria, def. Pablo Carreno Busta, Spain, and Guillermo Duran (4), Argentina, 7-5, 6-4.
Gonzalo Escorbar and Roberto Quiroz, Ecuador, def. Aliaksandr Bury, Belarus, and Peng Hsien-yin, Taiwan, 6-3, 7-5.
